entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 6 except plus 2 along the Bay of Chaleur coast. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Snowfall amount 2 cm. High 6 except plus 2 along the Bay of Chaleur coast. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers changing to 60 percent chance of flurries after midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Friday 17 March 2023
